description: The story is about a girl named Ronja who is the daughter of a chief of a tribe of bandits and lives in a huge castle in the forest with the bandits. The story follows Ronja as she encounters mystical creatures, makes friends with another young child like herself, and experiences life in the forest.

title.native: アルプスの少女ハイジ
借りぐらしのアリエッティ
ロミオ × ジュリエット
レ・ミゼラブル 少女コゼット

episodes.title: The Child of the Thunder Night
Into the Forest for the First Time
The Roaring Waterfall and the Wild Harpies
